ygData.subject: Re: Thinking about adventuring to Guk tonight- advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Woven, forget it unless you go and pay a troll to get it for you. Netted stuff you can get off the frogoks, fisherman, and tads. What a tadpole is doing
ygData.messageBody:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>I've been in and around Ro and the Commons for about a week now and I'm
>starting to feel more adventures. I decided on Guk to try to score
>some Netted, Woven and/or Mesh armor. If there are any wizards out


Woven, forget it unless you go and pay a troll to get it for you. Netted
stuff you can get off the frogoks, fisherman, and tads. What a tadpole is
doing with armor, I have NO clue.

>there who can give me some advice on what and where to hunt in Guk or

If you go into Guk stay to the first three rooms. do NOT venture past the
circular wooden bridge. You will only die, and it's a long and dangerous run
from freeport to reclaim your corpse. My troll warrior is level 8 and
doesn't go past those areas. Also watch out for trains. If there's a troll
in the tunnel you won't be able to get by. Sometimes jumping works,
sometimes not. Hopefully it'll work for you !

Zalbar
20th Wizard
Solusek Ro
